summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5850 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 7, Buckles Addition, and the Alley between Block 1, Gamma Poncin's Addition, and Block 1, Stander Addition, being the alley between 26th Avenue and 27th Avenue from East Marion Street to East Spring Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77122, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
